com.samsung.android.sdk.pass

Class SpassInvalidStateException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • java.lang.IllegalStateException
            • com.samsung.android.sdk.pass.SpassInvalidStateException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class SpassInvalidStateException
extends IllegalStateException
    This exception is thrown to indicate that identify request is denied because of fingerprint Service internally. This exception should be thrown.
    Since:
    1.1.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int STATUS_OPERATION_DENIED
      This state is returned if identify request is denied when fingerprint request is denied when fingerprint identify is blocked due to fingerprint identify failed 5 attempts, or while 30 second timer occurs due to password identify failed 5 attempts.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SpassInvalidStateException(String message, int errorType)
      Constructs a SpassInvalidStateException class with the specified detail message and error type.

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getType()
      Returns error type when identify is denied when fingerprint request is denied when fingerprint identify is blocked due to fingerprint identify failed 5 attempts, or while 30 second timer occurs due to password identify failed 5 attempts.
